mapper.select: SELECT u.user_sno as userSno, u.email, u.name, u.password_hash as passwordHash, ud.nickname FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_details ud ON u.user_sno = ud.user_sno WHERE u.email = #{email}
mapper.update: INSERT OR REPLACE INTO user_details (user_sno, nickname) VALUES (#{userSno}, #{nickname})
